Lyric:
[00:25.330]My face above the water
[00:28.710]My feet can't touch the ground,
[00:30.930]Touch the ground, and it feels like
[00:34.060]I can see the sands on the horizon
[00:36.470]Everytime you are not around
[00:39.260]I'm slowly drifting away (drifting away)
[00:43.460]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[00:47.430]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[00:51.230]And it feels like I'm drowning
[00:55.200]Pulling against the stream
[00:56.230]Pulling against the stream
[00:57.200]Drifting away (drifting away)
[00:59.590]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[01:01.620]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[01:13.310]My face above the water
[01:17.140]My feet can't touch the ground,
[01:18.910]Touch the ground, and it feels like
[01:21.430]I can see the sands on the horizon
[01:24.370]Everytime you are not around
[01:27.200]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[01:31.420]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[01:35.300]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[01:38.520]And it feels like I'm drowning
[01:41.560]Pulling against the stream
[01:43.430]Pulling against the stream
[02:02.450]Drifting away (drifting away)
[02:03.750]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[02:07.430]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[02:33.550]I wish I could make it easy
[02:37.460]Easy to love me, love me
[02:40.700]But still I reach, to find a way
[02:43.400]I'm stuck here in between
[02:45.230]I'm looking for the right words to say
[02:48.400]I'm slowly drifting, drifting away
[02:52.640]Wave after wave, wave after wave
[02:56.230]I'm slowly drifting (drifting away)
[03:00.290]And it feels like I'm drowning
[03:02.440]Pulling against the stream
[03:04.470]Pulling against the stream
